name: Chili ConCarne (Amy's Cooking Class)
description:
Amy loves to cook many different types of food, but the dish she loves to prepare the most is Ken's favorite, chili con carne. This savory and tangy chili is very easy to make as long as you follow the recipe. Amy loves to use her chili con carne for anything she can think of. Top your favorite hamburgers and hot dogs with the delicious chili, or turn any old plate of chips into nachos just by pouring on some of Barbie's delicious chili con carne. Gather and chop up all of the ingredients to add them to the fantastic chili mix, but hurry up and prepare everything before the time runs out. Follow the instructions to make Barbie's famous chili, and then serve it to Ken so that he can enjoy his absolute favorite meal in this fun Amy cooking game for girls!
Follow the instructions and tap to interact.
